notes: Sample showing new structure with CSV data integration

zones.suggested_route: Head to the North to kill the boss. The Mysterious Campsite spawns to the left or right of the starting zone.
zones.notes: Beira is always north/northeast of waypoint. Mud Burrow and the worm boss can be skipped.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Beira of the Rotten Pack
Mysterious Campsite (Abandoned Stash)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawns to the left or right of the starting zone

points_of_interest.name: Mud Burrow Entrance / Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Can be skipped - worm boss is not required

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill Beira of the Rotten Pack
walkthrough_steps.tip: Boss is always north/northeast of waypoint
Use checkpoint from Beira to come back here if you find the exit first
Spawns to left or right of starting zone

zones.suggested_route: Follow the diamond pattern to find the four main points of interest. The Red Vale entrance is usually in the same quadrant as the Brambleghast arena.
zones.notes: Find waypoint first (somewhat in center). Enter zones to take their waypoints, then backtrack to Grelwood.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Brambleghast
points_of_interest.location_hint: Usually in same quadrant as Red Vale entrance

points_of_interest.name: Aregane's Hut (Witch Hut)
points_of_interest.reward: Medium Life and Medium Mana Flask, Uncut Support Gem (Level 1)

points_of_interest.name: Grim Tangle Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

points_of_interest.name: The Red Vale Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find waypoint and talk to quest NPC
walkthrough_steps.tip: Waypoint is somewhat in center of zone
Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood
Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Cauldron in the Witch Hut encounter

town_visits.instructions: Go back to town, get runic tools from Renly
Go to Grelwood waypoint, click the three runes, talk to Una
Go back to town, talk to Una
